about_the_game:
Explore and defend a fantasy kingdom in the skies!

Emberhold is a bastion of hope for the people of Astria, one that has long been in slumber. With your help, the fires of the guilds and trade will awaken anew to battle the tides of evil lurking at it's borders! Work together with allies to reclaim lost territory and quell the warring factions. Rebuild your bastion to defend against the nightmares that lie beyond the fog and below the mists.

Experiment with varying playstyles

Outfit your party the way you want! Your characters can fight with a sword and shield, wield magic, or use a gun; your party composition is yours to decide how best to take on the challenges that await.

Collect, repair, craft, and expand

Gather resources and find unique items on your adventures to restore the Emberhold to it's former glory! Craft equipment at the forge to outfit your party before you set out so that you're ready to face even the strongest foes.

Face off against challenging enemies

Use strategy and skill to take down enemies in a variety of encounters. Even the simplest of foes can pose a threat in large numbers. Take your party and challenge powerful bosses in uniquely phased fights.
